00009   Change Speed effect, that affects both pitch & tempo.

00013 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGESPEED__
00014 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGESPEED__
00015 
00016 #include "Effect.h"
00017 #include "../Resample.h"
00018 
00019 #include <wx/choice.h>
00020 #include <wx/dialog.h>
00021 #include <wx/intl.h>
00022 #include <wx/slider.h>
00023 #include <wx/string.h>
00024 #include <wx/textctrl.h>
00025 
00026 class EffectChangeSpeed : public Effect {
00027 
00028  public:
00029    EffectChangeSpeed();
00030 
00031    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00032       return wxString(_("Change Speed..."));
00033    }
00034 
00035    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00036       std::set<wxString> result;
00037       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#PitchAndTempo"));
00038       return result;
00039    }
00040 
00041    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00042       return wxString(wxT("ChangeSpeed"));
00043    }
00044 
00045    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00046       return wxString(_("Changing Speed"));
00047    }
00048    
00049    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00050    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00051 
00052  protected:
00053    virtual bool PromptUser();
00054    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00055 
00056    virtual bool CheckWhetherSkipEffect() { return (m_PercentChange == 0.0); }
00057    virtual bool Process();
00058 
00059  private:
00060    bool ProcessOne(WaveTrack * t, sampleCount start, sampleCount end);
00061    bool ProcessLabelTrack(Track *t);
00062 
00063  private:
00064    // track related
00065    int    mCurTrackNum;
00066    double m_maxNewLength;
00067    double mCurT0;
00068    double mCurT1;
00069 
00070    // control values
00071    double   m_PercentChange;  // percent change to apply to tempo
00072                               // -100% is meaningless, but sky's the upper limit.
00073                               // Slider is (-100, 200], but textCtrls can set higher.
00074    int      m_FromVinyl;      // from standard vinyl speed (RPM)
00075    int      m_ToVinyl;        // to standard vinyl speed (RPM)
00076    double   mFactor;          // Scale factor calculated from percent change
00077 
00078 friend class ChangeSpeedDialog;
00079 };
00080

00082 // ChangeSpeedDialog
00083 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------

00088                      wxWindow * parent);

00091    bool TransferDataToWindow();
00092    bool TransferDataFromWindow();
00093 
00094  private:
00095    // handlers
00096    void OnText_PercentChange(wxCommandEvent & event);
00097    void OnSlider_PercentChange(wxCommandEvent & event);
00098    void OnChoice_FromVinyl(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00099    void OnChoice_ToVinyl(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00100 
00101    void OnPreview(wxCommandEvent &event);
00102 
00103    // helper fns
00104    void Update_Text_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00105    void Update_Slider_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00106    void Update_Vinyl(); // Update Vinyl controls for new percent change.
00107    void Update_PercentChange(); // Update percent change controls for new Vinyl values.
00108 
00109  private:
00110    EffectChangeSpeed * mEffect;
00111    bool m_bLoopDetect;
00112 
00113    // controls
00114    wxTextCtrl *   m_pTextCtrl_PercentChange;
00115    wxSlider *     m_pSlider_PercentChange;
00116    wxChoice *     m_pChoice_FromVinyl;
00117    wxChoice *     m_pChoice_ToVinyl;
00118 
00119  public:
00120    // effect parameters
00121    double   m_PercentChange;  // percent change to apply to tempo
00122                               // -100% is meaningless, but sky's the upper limit.
00123                               // Slider is (-100, 200], but textCtrls can set higher.
00124    int      m_FromVinyl;      // from standard vinyl speed (RPM)
00125    int      m_ToVinyl;        // to standard vinyl speed (RPM)
00126 
00127  private:
00128    DECLARE_EVENT_TABLE()
00129 };
